course_description: Required for HPM students. Introduces the theory and principles of management. Topic areas include motivation, leadership, organizational change, human resources administration, organizational theory, strategic planning, and management control systems. Teaches practical applications of management theory through case studies and group discussions.
sections: Class Nbr: 3196, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 5-6:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
